name: Wizard’s Bizarre Adventure
description:
Wizard's Bizarre Adventure is a 2D platformer where you play with your potions and the instability of the environment to free your way to your castle! . Use your different potions and their trajectory to reach unstable elements. . Use the unstable elements as platforms, or even springboard ! . And reach your castle with a limited number of potions. . We even used viable colorization for color blind people! Producer : Nicolas BLOIS Producer : Antoine BOULAY Game Art : Sidonie GOUT Game Design : Arthur CABLE Game Design : Théo POTTIER Game Programmer : Edwin ODEIMI Game Programmer : Hugo TUIL
